selectedVerses.text: On the twenty-third day of the seventh month he sent the people away to their homes, joyful and glad of heart for the prosperity that the LORD had granted to David and to Solomon and to Israel his people.
the rock badgers are a people not mighty, yet they make their homes in the cliffs;
And Peter said, "See, we have left our homes and followed you."

And I looked and arose and said to the nobles and to the officials and to the rest of the people, "Do not be afraid of them. Remember the Lord, who is great and awesome, and fight for your brothers, your sons, your daughters, your wives, and your homes."
And if I send them away hungry to their homes, they will faint on the way. And some of them have come from far away."
